name: Shadow (itch) (ZachElkins)
description:
NOTE: For some reason the level select works perfectly on some systems, but becomes a jumbled mess on others.

Run from your shadow! But be cautious because your shadow will fill up the room, restricting your movement. Find all the keys to unlock the door while trying not to get trapped.

Controls
  • WASD / Arrow Keys to move
  • ESC to return to main menu
  • R to restart the current level

Made for Weekly Game Jam 150 - "You're the Enemy"
